column5: Beauty fish!! Are they all that light in colour?
Nice going Jeff I hope to get out tomorrow for some great small mouth action Fishing on Erie has been great the last few week.

no the fish colouring varies so much in that lake , some light , some dark some with stripes some without the second picture in the original post are nice and dark the big one light ? i dunno why but thats how it is
WHOAAAA  What a PIG that bass is!! GREAT post.
Wicked fish man!   TDunn
Quite a fish & fishing trip catching 50 plus smallies - A day to remember........
Wow totally awesome fish!!!What a beauty
What a fish! How come most of my fish are just 1 or 2 pounders...?
That's a BIG ol bass. Congrats
now those are some serious smallies-sweet
thats a moose!

I fished the Friendship tournamment today with my dad , that was run by Bill of Niagara Outdoors show !!! what a wicked day we caught up near 50 small mouth and lost a bunch more But the Highlight of my day had to be this beast of a small mouth !!!!!!!! In the boat it weighed 7.2 but by the time it stressed in the livewell for offical weigh in it weighed 6.8 so i'm calling it a 7 pounder either way its BADASS !!!!!  what a day !!!!  heres some porn        oh yea and we won the tournament weighed in 14.6 on 3 fish     Thanks Bill for putting this together i know its a lot of hard work !!!
wow! that is an unreal fish.   bet she was quite the fight!
Nice fish !  Was this out of Crystal Beach?  If there's a website for the tournament please post it.
nice going
thats a CHUNK ALRIGHT!
Awesome smallie, infact a true brute !!
Wow, 50+ smallies and some nice ones at that!  Congrates on that pig of a PB and the tourney win!    That's gonna be a tough day on the water to beat.
Awesome!
Wow.   What a tank.   Congrats on the day.
nice football... i didn't know they replaced the pig skin
Wow    Look at the size of that fish Congrats on the hawg and winning the tournament Leechman
Now that is a smallie!  Sounds like you had one of those days to remember forever and best of all, you were sharing it with your Dad.  Congrats!
that's a horse!!!! nice fish!  Erie is a great place for lunker smallies, im jealous of guys that can fish there regularily!
What a slob that smallie is.  Good going out there.
Looks a little beat up but a beauty none the less   Congrats on the pb
nice fish!! Good job. Just a clarification.  It says big fish was 7.3 pounds and that it belonged to B Bondar.  Where do you get the 6.8 from?
Monster bass but she definitely looks stressed out. Did it give a good fight? Congrats on the win and PB.
Congrats to you on the great big fish and the win!

Congrats on the big fish and your win!!! My customers freaked when they 1st saw that tank of a smallmouth!! LOL....Glad to hear that fish lived and is still in the lake, think about getting that same fish in the late fall  omg.........
CONGRATS FOR THE WIN AND THE PB!
Great job buddy, hope to catch some big smallies in a month or so. A 7lb bass.....
Holy cow what an amazing fish!
